Title: Establishes the public housing fund
Summary: Establishes the public housing fund to be used by the division of housing and community renewal to support existing public housing utilizing money from the real property transfer tax.
LawCode: Amd ยง1421, Tax L; add ยง92-kk, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the state finance law, in relation to establishing the public housing fund
